text: Nissan Navara (also called Nissan Frontier) is a pickup truck from Nissan. The line began around 1997. It replaced the Datsun Hardbody trucks. The Navara is named for the Navarre region in northern Spain. The truck is available in two and four doors. ==References== Category:Nissan automobiles Category:1990s automobiles Category:2000s automobiles Category:2010s automobiles
title: Nissan Navara
